document.full_text: india's government suffered a fresh blow thursday in containing growing anger over corruption from million of voters as a leading civil activist joined forces with an influential yoga guru in a "fast-until-death" against graft.
document.title: india yoga guru anti-graft fast gains momentum
lines_and_colors: india's government suffered a fresh blow thursday in containing growing anger over corruption from million of voters as a leading civil activist joined forces with an influential yoga guru in a "fast-until-death" against graft.
